gaia::connectivity::BtProfileServiceListener Class Reference

An abstract class for notifying BluetoothProfile IPC clients when they have been connected or disconnected to the service. More...

Detailed Description

An abstract class for notifying BluetoothProfile IPC clients when they have been connected or disconnected to the service.
